name: Leave Me Alone! (toastyburk)
description:
Trijam #152 - Theme: Leave Me Alone!

Try to stay alive and avoid being eaten by zombies for as long as possible.

My first game jam and published game.  Made based off of the Godot First Game tutorial, but with my chosen assets.

Took about 2 hours and 40 minutes.

WASD or arrow buttons for movement. 
Space to start the game.

Made in Godot Engine.

Art and music assets found on opengameart.org.
